info.title: MyFlix Express API with Swagger
info.description: This is a simple CRUD API application that serves movie data, made with Express and documented with Swagger

parameters.name: obj
parameters.description: Details of the user to be addded.

birthday.example: Date of birth of the user

200.description: Details of the user that was added.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.description: Details of the user to be deleted.

username.example: username of the user to be deleted

200.description: A message with the username of the user that was deleted

400.description: A message saying that the username of the user was not found

parameters.name: obj
parameters.description: Info fields of the user that can be updated. Fields that are not being updated should be removed from the request body

birthday.example: Date of birth of the user

200.description: Details of the user with the updated field.

description.example: List of favorite movies of the user.
List of favorite movies of the user.

parameters.name: movieID
parameters.description: ID of the movie that needs to be added

200.description: Details of the user with the updated favorite movies list.

description.example: List of favorite movies of the user.

parameters.description: ID of the movie that needs to be deleted.
